corpus.name: Directive (EU) 2022/2464 — Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD)
corpus.scope: Amends EU accounting, transparency, and audit directives to require sustainability reporting by in-scope undertakings, based on ESRS, with phased application.

corpus.name: Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/2772 — ESRS (Set 1)
corpus.scope: Establishes binding European Sustainability Reporting Standards specifying sustainability disclosures required under CSRD.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2020/852 — EU Taxonomy Regulation
corpus.scope: Creates an EU classification system for environmentally sustainable economic activities and related disclosure obligations.

corpus.name: Directive (EU) 2024/1760 — Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive (CSDDD)
corpus.scope: Imposes corporate due-diligence duties to identify, prevent, mitigate, and remedy adverse human rights and environmental impacts across operations and value chains.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2023/1542 — Batteries Regulation
corpus.scope: Lays down sustainability, safety, labelling, and end-of-life requirements for batteries and waste batteries placed on the EU market.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2025/40 — Packaging and Packaging Waste Regulation (PPWR)
corpus.scope: Sets requirements to prevent and reduce packaging waste, improve packaging sustainability, and ensure waste management across the EU.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 — Sustainable Finance Disclosure Regulation (SFDR)
corpus.scope: Establishes sustainability-related disclosure obligations for financial market participants and advisers.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2023/1115 — Deforestation-free Products Regulation (EUDR)
corpus.scope: Requires due diligence to ensure certain commodities and derived products placed on or exported from the EU are deforestation-free and legally produced.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2023/956 — Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM)
corpus.scope: Introduces a mechanism addressing embedded greenhouse-gas emissions in certain imported goods through reporting and adjustment obligations.

corpus.name: Directive (EU) 2023/970 — Pay Transparency Directive
corpus.scope: Strengthens enforcement of equal pay by introducing pay-transparency and reporting obligations, subject to national transposition.

corpus.name: Regulation (EU) 2024/3015 — Forced Labour Products Regulation
corpus.scope: Prohibits products made with forced labour from being placed on or exported from the EU market, with investigation and enforcement mechanisms.
